```{r}
# Initialize an empty data frame to store the filtered data
filtered_data <- data.frame(ID = sample_data$ID)

# Loop through the columns of the sample data frame, starting from the third column
for (i in seq(3, ncol(sample_data), by = 2)) {
  filtered_data <- cbind(filtered_data, sample_data[, i])
}

# View the resulting data
print(filtered_data)
```
